Minutes

Report from ISMB

Demo and presentation went well. A lot of interest in the BioCatalogue. We should now focus on analysis of the content and a SPARQL endpoint for the BioCatalogue

Report from IEEE conference

Presentation of the Functional Unit went well, now need to focus on the implementation.

Daily operations Report

  • the site was a bit slow but it's now fine

Review of public wiki and public facing material

Sustainability of the BioCatalogue

  • BioCatalogue has been proposed as a ELIXIR node.
  • We might consider include BioCatalogue as part of the apache foundation
